name: Lucible
headline: Combined checking and investment account
description: Lucible is a combined checking and investment account that allows you to invest 100% of your money while still being able to spend it. Whenever you spend, we issue a loan in real time, using your investments as collateral, to cover the cost. This is the most capital and tax efficient way to manage your money. It's what the ultra wealthy already do to finance large purchases, and now you can do it for every day spending.

founders.name: Toby Hirsch, Founder
founders.description: Toby is the co-founder and CEO of Lucible. Before Lucible, Toby worked as a quantitative trader at Jane Street. He graduated from Penn's M&T program with degrees in computer science and statistics.

founders.name: Victor Lin, Founder
founders.description: Victor is the co-founder and CTO of Driftly. Victor has a background in software and ML, formerly working at Jane Street, Figma, and Bytedance. He formerly founded Umpcast, a scheduling solution for baseball leagues that is used by little leagues across the bay.

[![Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/6732d7135d39d28b203e14a6_Lucible%20Logo.svg)](https://luciblefi.com/</>)
[About](https://luciblefi.com/</about>)
[Join Waitlist](https://luciblefi.com/<#demo-signup>)
# Invest your checking account balance
Lucible lets invest 100% of your money without sacrificing liquidity
[Join the Waitlist](https://luciblefi.com/<#demo-signup>)
## How it Works
Lucible lets you combine the benefits of a checking and brokerage account
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/66fcd0b29deab155028ea72d_Vector%20\(20\).png)
### Seamless Onboarding
Connect your checking account, and Lucible will work automatically in the background
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/66fcd0b29deab155028ea70c_workflow%201.png)
### Automatic Investment
Lucible automatically invests your deposits in the S&P 500, maximizing your returns on every dollar
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/66fcd0b29deab155028ea859_icons8-cycle-96.png)
### On-Demand Margin Loans
Whenever you spend money, Lucible automatically gives you a margin loan at **8%** APR
## Improve HHVBP Metrics
Driftly learns from your historical data using AI to determine which nurses are right for which patients to reduce acute readmissions and improve OASIS outcomes.
[Get started now](https://luciblefi.com/<#demo-signup>)
![Over View Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/66fcd0b29deab155028ea87e_Screen%20Shot%202024-06-06%20at%204.43.45%20PM.png)
## Schedule in a Single Click
Driftly automatically finds the best times for your visits, allowing your schedulers to effortlessly make efficient decisions
![Vactor](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/66fcd0b29deab155028ea745_Vector%2025%20\(Stroke\).svg)
Simple
![Vactor](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/66fcd0b29deab155028ea745_Vector%2025%20\(Stroke\).svg)
Fast
![Vactor](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/66fcd0b29deab155028ea745_Vector%2025%20\(Stroke\).svg)
Efficient
![Prisla](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/66fcd0b29deab155028ea87b_Screen%20Shot%202024-06-05%20at%2010.49.52%20AM.png)
## Maximize Nurse Utilization
Decrease time spent idle and on the road, allowing your clinicians to see as many patients as possible.
[Find out more](https://luciblefi.com/<#demo-signup>)
![Over View Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/66fcd0b29deab155028ea87f_Screen%20Shot%202024-06-16%20at%204.23.18%20PM.png)
## Robust EHR Integrations
We read from and write to your EHR, allowing your schedulers to use Driftly without changing clinician workflows
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/66fcd0b29deab155028ea855_epic-logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/66fcd0b29deab155028ea87c_wellsky-logo.jpeg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/66fcd0b29deab155028ea881_matrixcare-logo.svg)
### Join the waitlist
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
[![Footer Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fcd0b29deab155028ea66e/6732dab97127bfcaef04e6d5_lucible-logo-light-bg.svg)](https://luciblefi.com/</>)

generated_description:
**Lucible: Redefining How We Manage Money**

Lucible is a pioneering fintech startup established in 2024 and is part of the Y Combinator Batch S24. With a nimble team of just two, the company is driven by a clear mission: to merge the functionality of checking accounts with investment accounts. Imagine being able to invest all your available cash while still having the flexibility to spend it—Lucible makes that happen.

### How It Works

Here's the crux of Lucible's innovative approach: they offer a combined checking and investment account that allows you to invest 100% of your cash without sacrificing liquidity. Whenever you tap into your account to spend, Lucible provides a margin loan—backed by your investments—at an appealing **8% APR**. This is similar to strategies used by the ultra-wealthy, leveling the playing field for everyday consumers.

1. **Seamless Onboarding**: Just connect your checking account, and Lucible takes care of the rest, operating quietly in the background.
   
2. **Automatic Investments**: Your cash deposits are automatically invested in the S&P 500, maximizing the potential for returns on every dollar you allocate.

3. **Real-Time Finance**: Every time you make a purchase, Lucible responds instantly with a loan to cover the costs, keeping your financial strategy agile and efficient.

Lucible's approach transforms how you perceive your disposable income. You no longer have to choose between investing and spending; you can do both simultaneously and efficiently.

### Why It Matters

In a world where personal finance often feels convoluted, Lucible is simplifying the process. They offer a robust solution to help everyday users maximize their returns without the age-old compromise between liquidity and investment. It's a game-changer for anyone who wants to use their assets wisely while enjoying everyday financial freedom.

### Connect with Lucible

Want to learn more or get started? You can visit their website at [luciblefi.com](https://luciblefi.com) and join their waitlist to be among the first to access this innovative service. Lucible is not just reshaping how we view our finances; it’s setting a new standard for financial efficiency—one investment and purchase at a time.
